paragraphs.text: Roberto Lencioni (“Carube”) is an all round cycling legend. He was Cipollini’s personal and most trusted mechanic.

A talented racer in his younger years, he then went on to become a mechanic in the biggest teams of the time – such as Saeco, Domina Vacanze, Naturino, Del Tongo, Jolly Club 88, Universal Caffè, Gis, San Giacomo, Selle San Marco, Alfa Lum, Magniflex, Alba Cucine, Dromedario.
He also directed a professional women’s team, winning the Giro d’Italia with Michela Fanini, and also served as a team manager for the National Team of Argentina.
He now collaborates with L’Eroica, provides services to bike tours, works for Vittoria Servizio Corse in competitive cycling events.
He can tell stories for days, it’s just a pleasure – and an incredible honour – to have him with us.
Luis is an inhabitant of the world proudly born in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain.

He’s an adventurer and a dreamer, driven by curiosity and a continuous search for challenge. His life path brought him so far from the European aerospace industry, to launching rockets into space in the French Guiana, to a pro cycling career as a skilled race mechanic for top level organizations such as Team Sunweb, USA Cycling or Trek Segafedo.
And the best is always still to come.
Lucia is a Project Manager from Verona, Italy.
A former high level soccer player, she started riding a few years ago, and got the bug for it.
Once she gets out of the office she can be a bartender, a hostess during events, a scoutmaster for kids, she just loves spending time with people.
Charismatic and energetic, she embraced this project with joy and commitment.
